headline: Heartland Opportunistic Value Equity Strategy Initiated a Position in Applied Materials (AMAT) in Q2
summary: Heartland Advisors, an investment management company, released its “Heartland Opportunistic Value Equity Strategy” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, investors’ sentiments shifted to a more optimistic tone as concerns about a recession were overblown.
